summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Washington State Department of Transportation for allocation of Federal Aid Urban Systems Funds (FAUS) for financial assistance for the improvement of the Northeast 45th Street Viaduct - West Approach; authorizing the hiring of consultants; preparation of plans, specifications and estimates; awarding of contract(s) and increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1979 Operating Budget of the Engineering Department.
